description: Looking out over the calm blue water, this classic restaurant serves traditional cuisine with the occasional imaginative twist. Fish from the lake feature on the menu, as do meat and seafood options with something for everyone. There’s also a small outdoor terrace where guests can enjoy a pre- or post-dinner drink.
